definition: to come or be in close contact with
details:
verb
- to come or be in close contact with
= synonyms: cling
- to have internal elements or parts logically connected so that aesthetic consistency results
= example: to have internal elements or parts logically connected so that aesthetic consistency results
- to cause to form a united, orderly, and aesthetically consistent whole
= example: to cause to form a united, orderly, and aesthetically consistent whole
